3rdLevelDruidSpells.Name: Call Lightning
3rdLevelDruidSpells.Description: A storm cloud appears in the shape of a cylinder that is 10 feet tall with a 60-foot radius, centered on a point you can see 100 feet directly above you.

3rdLevelDruidSpells.Name: Conjure Animals
3rdLevelDruidSpells.Description: You summon fey spirits that take the form of beasts and appear in unoccupied spaces that you can see within range.

3rdLevelDruidSpells.Name: Daylight
3rdLevelDruidSpells.Description: A 60-foot-radius sphere of light spreads out from a point you choose within range.

3rdLevelDruidSpells.Name: Dispel Magic
3rdLevelDruidSpells.Description: Choose any creature, object, or magical effect within range.

3rdLevelDruidSpells.Name: Meld into Stone
3rdLevelDruidSpells.Description: You step into a stone object or surface large enough to fully contain your body, melding yourself and all the equipment you carry with the stone for the duration.

3rdLevelDruidSpells.Name: Plant Growth
3rdLevelDruidSpells.Description: This spell channels vitality into plants within a specific area.

3rdLevelDruidSpells.Name: Protection from Energy
3rdLevelDruidSpells.Description: For the duration, the willing creature you touch has resistance to one damage type of your choice.

3rdLevelDruidSpells.Name: Sleet Storm
3rdLevelDruidSpells.Description: Until the spell ends, freezing rain and sleet fall in a 20-foot-tall cylinder with a 40-foot radius centered on a point you choose within range.

3rdLevelDruidSpells.Name: Speak with Plants
3rdLevelDruidSpells.Description: You imbue plants within 30 feet of you with limited sentience and animation.

3rdLevelDruidSpells.Name: Water Breathing
3rdLevelDruidSpells.Description: This spell gives a maximum of ten willing creatures you can see within range the ability to breathe underwater.

3rdLevelDruidSpells.Name: Water Walk
3rdLevelDruidSpells.Description: This spell grants the ability to move across any liquid surface, such as water, acid, mud, snow, quicksand, or lava, as if it were harmless solid ground.

3rdLevelDruidSpells.Name: Wind Wall
3rdLevelDruidSpells.Description: A wall of strong wind rises from the ground at a point you choose within range.
